conversation.content: *exhale* So, um, last time I tried getting a discount it was a whole thing.
Oh yeah, I know exactly what you mean... the discount system is honestly kind of a mess sometimes. But let me pull up your account here with, er... what's your email or account number?
It's, uh, jchen4891 at gmail. Er, do you guys even honor student discounts anymore?

Yeah we definitely do! So I'm seeing your account ID is ACC-7744-BNX and, hmm, looks like you had some issues back in March with a verification thing... honestly our verification portal is, like, needlessly complicated.
*sharp inhale* Right, exactly. Um, so what do I need this time?

Okay so for student discount it's... hold on, they just changed this... ah here we go. You need to upload your student ID to our verification portal VRF-EDU-2024, and it has to show a current semester sticker or, uh, enrollment date that's within the last six months.
Uh, and if it gets rejected again? Because honestly I can't deal with another—

No no, I totally get it. Actually what I can do is... let me set up a priority review flag on your submission. Your case reference will be STU-994821-P and that basically means it gets human eyes instead of just the automated system which, between you and me, rejects stuff for really dumb reasons sometimes.
Oh. *exhale* Okay that's, er, that's actually helpful. Um, what about senior discounts though?

Senior discount is way easier actually—you just need to be 65 or older and, hmm... yeah it's automatic once I verify your birthdate. No portal nonsense or anything like that... Do you have someone who might qualify?
My mom, yeah. She's, uh, she's been trying to order but the prices are just—

Oh for sure, I mean, our regular prices are kind of... anyway, if she creates an account I can retroactively apply the senior code SEN-AUTO-15 to past orders too, going back, er... looks like up to 60 days.
Wait really? *sharp inhale* That would actually help a lot. Um, how much is the discount?

So students get 20% off with code EDU-VERIFY-20, and seniors get 15% but it stacks with our bulk discounts which... actually that's pretty good if she orders multiple items. Plus there's this thing where... hmm, what's the word... like a loyalty bonus that kicks in after three orders?
Er, okay. And this won't mysteriously stop working next month?

*laughs* Yeah I know, I know... Look, once you're verified in our system with confirmation VRF-COMPLETE, it's good for a full year. Though, uh, fair warning—the renewal process is admittedly kind of annoying, but at least you won't have to deal with it until next November.
*exhale* Alright. Um, you've actually been really helpful, not gonna lie.

Aw thanks! Honestly just trying to make this less painful than it needs to be... Oh actually, one more thing—if you text DISCOUNT to 555-829-4000, it'll send you both discount codes directly so you don't have to, like, dig through emails or whatever.
Oh perfect. Er, yeah, I'll do that. Thanks for not making this impossible.

Happy to help! And seriously, if the verification gives you any trouble, just reference that case number I gave you and, um... actually just ask for me directly, I'm extension 7412. We'll get it sorted one way or another.

scenario: asking about eligibility for a student or senior discount
